thread.title: Report: Romney Looking To Make Surprising Investment In Trump’s Hometown
thread.title_full: Report: Romney Looking To Make Surprising Investment In Trump’s Hometown

author: Jack Davis
title: Report: Romney Looking To Make Surprising Investment In Trump’s Hometown
text:
Report: Romney’s Refusal to Apologize to Trump Cost Him Secretary of State Job 
According to the report on FanRag Sports , the Romneys are thought to be interested in buying one or two ownership points at a cost of $25 million to $30 million per point. The overall value of the iconic franchise is around $3 billion. 
The report that Mitt Romney is pursuing an interest in the Yankees generated a buzz on Twitter, especially since the former Massachusetts governor is a fan of the Boston Red Sox — the archrival of the Yankees. If this happens, @MittRomney is going to have a very difficult conversation with his Red Sox-loving grandchildren. https://t.co/ZV0F0oLQLP 
— Matt Viser (@mviser) February 23, 2017 Advertisement – story continues below WTF does Mitt Romney want with the #Yankees ! No… no… no! Tell him to stay in Massachusetts with that crappy team in Boston!
